chunked_vad.lyrics_text: There was a time when I was alone Nowhere to go and no place to call home My only friend was the man in the Moon And even, sometimes, he would go away, too
Nowhere to go and no place to call home My only friend was the man in the Moon And even, sometimes, he would go away, too Then one night, as I closed my eyes
My only friend was the man in the Moon And even, sometimes, he would go away, too Then one night, as I closed my eyes I saw a shadow flying high
And even, sometimes, he would go away, too Then one night, as I closed my eyes I saw a shadow flying high He came to me with the sweetest smile
Then one night, as I closed my eyes I saw a shadow flying high He came to me with the sweetest smile Told me he wanted to talk for a while
I saw a shadow flying high He came to me with the sweetest smile Told me he wanted to talk for a while He said, "Peter Pan, that's what they call me
He came to me with the sweetest smile Told me he wanted to talk for a while He said, "Peter Pan, that's what they call me I promise that you'll never be lonely"
Told me he wanted to talk for a while He said, "Peter Pan, that's what they call me I promise that you'll never be lonely" And ever since that day
He said, "Peter Pan, that's what they call me I promise that you'll never be lonely" And ever since that day I am a Lost Boy from Neverland
I promise that you'll never be lonely" And ever since that day I am a Lost Boy from Neverland Usually hanging out with Peter Pan
And ever since that day I am a Lost Boy from Neverland Usually hanging out with Peter Pan And when we're bored, we play in the woods
